review: The TV in the spare room doesn't have a cable box so I plug in  the fire stick and get to watch all the shows I want on Netflix, you tube and amazon. Well worth the money. Just buying another one for my daughter in--law.
author: Anna Turner

review: After two months of minimal use, my FireTV stick has stopped working. It tries to load but constantly resets over and over again. I called customer support, and after numerous attempts of trying to get it to work, they are sending me a new one. Well, I think it's new. Kind of weird that I will only get the actual stick- not a whole new package. I hope I don't get a refurb considering the one I have is basically brand new. Regardless, customer service was nice to deal with. Looking forward to getting my FireTV stick back and in working order.
author: Cat M

review: 4 days after connecting the device to our tv and power source it is having connectivity issues, saying 'Signal not in range.' All other wireless devices in our home are working fine, as did the Roku which we were replacing with the fire stick to increase speed.
